# Generated by Pod::WikiDoc version 0.13

=pod

=head1 NAME

XDG - ToolSet with common features for DAGOLDEN

=head1 SYNOPSIS

     use XDG;
 
     # strict is on
     # warnings are on
 
     carp "We know how to carp";
     say "boo";

=head1 DESCRIPTION

This is a custom L<ToolSet>.  It imports the following functions from 
various modules:

=over

=item *

Carp: C<<< carp, croak, confess >>>

=item *

Perl6::Say: C<<< say >>>

=item *

Scalar::Util: C<<< blessed refaddr reftype >>>

=back

C<<< strict >>> and C<<< warnings >>> are automatically enabled.

=head1 BUGS AND LIMITATIONS

Report any bugs to the author

=head1 AUTHOR

David A Golden  C<<< <dagolden@cpan.org> >>>
